title: Wild at heart
creator_credit: PolyGram Propaganda Productions, Monty Montgomery, Steve Golin, Joni Sighvatsson and David Lynch
brief_description: The story of Sailor (Nicolas Cage) and Lula (Laura Dern), young lovers on the run from the law, with Lula’s insanely obsessive mother (Diane Ladd) who will stop at nothing to keep them apart. This is a film about dark obsessions, murderous secrets and torrid passion. A truly gothic Road Movie. Also stars Willem Dafoe, Harry Dean Stanton and Isabella Rossellini. Based on the novel by Barry Gifford.
